import React, {Component} from 'react'; import './creecov.css'; class Creecov extends Component { constructor(){ super(); this.state={ choice:'none' } } onChoiceChange1=(choice)=>{ this.setState({choice:'simple'}) } onChoiceChange2=(choice)=>{ this.setState({choice:'avancee'}) } render(){ return(


{ this.state.choice==="simple" ?
























: (this.state.choice==="avancee" ?
























:
) }
); } } export default Creecov;
